message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be a valuable asset to you. Given its value, I'm offering it at $14,000.
I'm really interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,500 is a bit too low, I'm willing to come down to $12,500.  I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $12,500, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $11,000?
Bob, I see you're serious about this product, and I want to make a deal.  Let's settle this right now - $11,750, and it's yours.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $11,000. This is my final offer.
